segments.text: Okay , I ’ ll take it . By the way , do you have delivery service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don ’ t need to carry the furniture home because we have delivery service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wo will deliver the goods to you for free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good . Could you deliver it to this address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Please write down your name and your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Can you tell me the delivery time ?
segments.speaker: S1
